item.title: 在基辅度过了一个恐怖之夜之后，寻找死亡的搜查继续-BBC
item.description: 在基辅度过了恐怖之夜之后，寻找死亡的搜索＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc kyiv哀悼，因为俄罗斯罢工的死亡人数攀升至28 ＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 在乌克兰西南部的冲突中，教会控制了教会的控制，而从莫斯科隶属的神职人员转移了href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiiiwfbvv95cuxpotdjcjrkcuxyqlkcuxyqlvxvxvxvutwzfd4rnbybjbjbjbjbjbjbjbjbwtxhfcnlzx1r3y3y3y3y3y3y3y3y3y3y3vmwkfkfkfkfkfkxznumenexc grhrwiyeelhunlvrs14cf9makzitgpudtm3bnd3zg83nhvmdjryq3dhthljbtbitppwb3bquv92tttttzkmtdbtlzkmtdbtlzzu2vyylo0njq1ckdotglrohdyunjj？oc = 5 target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯无人机和导弹袭击基辅至少10 ＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmizgfbvv95cuxqdesysfiyazjxekxekxstufxcve 3MTK4QWWXDUHYTEHYVLHZKK1QA3BAVNJCEXNSQTLJEXJKV1BVWGM3CL9CL95Q21FM2FORJGZA3PUNDY3CLVYVK 4XN1LFCE5NRETOQ2DAEHFVEVRSZERZS3PJWNNHUEX5WXU0BU0BU0WVK9JYVNISJHHUWFTFFFTQ3P5VNJYDZLHNV9XV NJJV0N5UVHBDXRYR3U5CWR2MZZTDUS5US5UFI1LTZJLXHMMGKTR0PGV0L0TUQXC2L0NTL0NTLOY2T0Z3C2UQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯对基夫的袭击中的死亡人数升至28- ＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 加拿大情报机构说，印度是外国干预的肇事者 - 路透社
item.description: 印度是外国干预的肇事者，加拿大情报机构说＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 加拿大情报人员在卡尼遇到莫迪＆nbsp; nbsp; 监护人 印度和加拿大移动以修补锡克教激进主义者的杀戮损害＆nbsp; 纽约时报 加拿大和印度的重置关系，作为Mark Carney和Narendra Modi Meet ＆nbsp;＆nbsp; Financial Times PM感谢墨西哥总统在印度反恐斗争中的支持

item.title: 医务人员说，以色列袭击在24小时内在加沙杀死140次，因为重点转移到伊朗 - 路透社
item.description: 以色列攻击在24小时内在加沙杀死140次，因为重点转移到伊朗＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; 以色列坦克在加沙人群中杀死59人，试图获得粮食援助，＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvv95cuxptujox2ffa2ffa2pqdwltn0jhri1wdfntrlbit0lbit0lbit0lnsxh6mwjutm5lbits xmwjutm5lqlqlzsb21wyufuchuchuchuchuchuchuchuchuchuckmw422422422422422422242242242242242242242242242242242224224224222424ZZMW42242242422422422422422242242242424242424A并p2Mnfpuuqymhrkwdfkeg5pnwjhnjuxnk1qykjvajbqnfb0dty3dknjmgrpq2dqz2l1r KPICU5PQXNSBFVNTLATMXNLB05TVHDXNDR4TWK2C0XWCJLQTXU2A3HYMGZUQWVQWQwQWHRK X2FMSDBsako3NTNz0gG0AUFVX3lxTE9pemFqa05KMzFETERFSk1nbzYyNElMM1dzREluOC1VX1lVYmNYbkFTRXAzLTJ0M2pGR2hFOXhzOEU4XzdTdlAtY0R1VHQ4TXpUVWFFMV REVTlybTFqZjY2ZE1NR2hxNTU3LVdmU1ZGMk9ubnRYRUNMWjFqcVRHUDhrRldOcGRNM3hNNkNXZGt4Rkc1cTVuYzk2d0l6UUJxV254di1XVlRtRnVVR3FueFJ5WGQxTA?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>以色列部队在加沙杀死69名巴勒斯坦人，其中包括29个寻求援助＆nbsp; nbsp; al href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmisgfbvvv95cuxooxlcawu4dktlof CYZ3DKD2L1V29BWLM1V3NWZ0JVCZQ5DWLMMNNIDK5PMKRPVNROR3FHV2XUBHRKDDLSNZVMSNZVMS3U 0ntz6znnroHfiqnd1uxzQQQQQQQQQQQQSM1Y2OUZZYTHWS3AXUEJVZLHYNEJQVDH6NTDHYULMSHFAS0FS zupknznxdel3vhvnrglxoenebe4tttvnmdfnorgpzqufnlu96dnnacdrbm2fnclbjmgl3？oc = 5“加沙官员说，目标=“ _ blank”>以色列部队杀死11个巴勒斯坦人，等待食物卡车，说 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxtfb0ajbfcgjesgzmymutzercctdxtmzu S3L0RENOTDRZWJDRVM1DZ2LUVM9DRJBOQ0TLBK54MEF6ULHKYLHKYLBUWUFPVMXNA1LPCW1RZXH5CWHXME1QDW？oc = 5“目击者和救援人员说＆nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f”

item.title: 英国议会禁止妇女被起诉晚期堕胎-NPR
item.description: 英国。议会禁止妇女因晚期流产而被起诉＆nbsp; nbsp; npr 议员投票决定将英格兰和威尔士妇女的堕胎合法化＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmif0fvx3lxtfbdc2hpt3dmuxlrsmdsrsmdsr0lpqk5vsxpxsxpxskptttgdouw1jcu towwgwuvhtmel3wgnazjbzadberzrud3btb2tpueo2d0lkzlrscnv2qtd1azbbszmwahdksmxhsmxhsmn0shjfrlbsexjtaev4tkreowc 3NKLSEFLHB2C1YM_SAYQBQVVFEXFMTMDDYUSWTVHGN1D1OE9LU2NRD2NRD2NRD2OWVZR3SC1VSSK1TEK1TEK1TE1MTJA5WGLON09HLXNWMS1TNWMS1INWMS1INVVR QMNRBHVNX1FTAU5OAKPNDGZCR2PMM0ZOSMJ5N0V2QXJYEFFMEMLKTVJHY0DGAFBRAU1ABHBHB3SGXFSGXFSVC3RGPASTRMZEVFLWIZ？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>英国议员投票将孕妇的堕胎合法化，而美国却打破了＆nbsp; cnn MPS投票将英格兰和威尔士女性堕胎合法化＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQOXVScDBWUzhoYm95eGxVQ1FER1RMVDJjSUJIR3VKZzUyLUlfZFRsWU5xYk5XalNBM1d2TFVBZkd3TG1HUU tyzwznmgflrnlpn3h0dmzky3dqyuxnmg5lnvvsbjbjbjbjbjbjbov0lvdmljdvhucdzfcjnwmnrpazq1b dayluuzr2tvnu5uvuxdafj3mwfzv1uzvxfwoenzzwpotdvktjjjxcwtzcwtzuwfiz3zpzpzw？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>由于左派的胆怯，堕胎仍然是英国的刑事犯罪。我们必须从中学习 - 快速＆nbsp; 守护者
